baseRule.text: 若比丘知水有蟲。飲用者波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 62

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 62

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer Wasser, von dem er weiß, daß es lebende (Wasser-) Tierchen enthält, (zum Trinken oder Waschen) benutzt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk uses water that he knows contains living beings, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, sabiendo que el agua que contiene seres vivos, hace uso de ella: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知水有蟲取用。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 41

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知水有蟲。取用者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 41

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻知水有虫受用者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 41

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知水有虫飲者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 51

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！知水有蟲飲用者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 62

translations.text: If a monk drink water which he knows has insects in it, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu meminum air, dengan mengetahui terdapat serangga di dalamnya, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知水有蟲飲用者。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 41

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 143

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer Wasser, von dem sie weiß, daß es lebende ‚Wasser-‘Tierchen enthält, ‚zum Trinken oder Waschen‘ benutzt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni knowingly make use of water with living beings in it, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang dengan sadar menggunakan air dengan makhluk hidup di dalamnya, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，知水有蟲，飲用者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 47

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼知水有蟲取用。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 26

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼知水有虫受用者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 28

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。知水有蟲而飲者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 41
